page.title: 04SOCIAL TRENDS
page.content: The majority of the families living in our area have done so for twenty years or more.Most families consist of 2 or 3 people with the occasional large family of 5 or 6. Most own a colour T.V,a hi-fi and at least one car. Nearly all the families shop in the local shops or town center, which they find inadequate. The feeling is that a greater variety of shops is needed. The most popular past-time is sport,including squash,canoing and of course the national game,rugby. The younger element being the participants and the older element the spectators. The survey showed that while some people smoked many had either given up or were in the process of giving up.
